description: Sample Bollinger Bands + RSI Strategy. This strategy uses Bollinger Bands and RSI indicators to generate buy/sell signals
author: Sample Author

populate_indicators.description: Calculate technical indicators including RSI and Bollinger Bands
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate RSI with period 14
2. Calculate Bollinger Bands with window 20, stds 2
3. Extract upper, lower, and middle bands
4. Return dataframe with indicators

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with added technical indicators: rsi, bb_lowerband, bb_upperband, bb_middleband
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Uses TA-Lib to calculate RSI(14) and qtpylib for Bollinger Bands(20,2). These indicators help identify overbought/oversold conditions and price volatility.

populate_buy_trend.description: Generate buy signals based on RSI and Bollinger Bands
populate_buy_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check if RSI > 25 (above oversold)
2. Check if close price < lower Bollinger Band
3. If both conditions true, set buy = 1
4. Return dataframe with buy signals
populate_buy_trend.output_description: DataFrame with buy column indicating buy signals (1 = buy, 0 = no action)
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Looks for oversold bounce opportunities when price drops below lower Bollinger Band but RSI shows some strength (>25). This avoids catching falling knives while identifying potential reversal points.

populate_sell_trend.description: Generate sell signals based on RSI and Bollinger Bands
populate_sell_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check if RSI > 70 (overbought)
2. Check if close price > upper Bollinger Band
3. If both conditions true, set sell = 1
4. Return dataframe with sell signals
populate_sell_trend.output_description: DataFrame with sell column indicating sell signals (1 = sell, 0 = no action)
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies overbought conditions when price extends above upper Bollinger Band and RSI exceeds 70. This suggests potential price exhaustion and reversal opportunity.

custom_stoploss.logic_explanation: Strategy relies on fixed stoploss rather than dynamic stoploss logic.

indicators.name: RSI
indicators.description: Relative Strength Index - momentum oscillator measuring speed and magnitude of price changes

indicators.name: Bollinger Bands
indicators.description: Volatility bands consisting of moving average with upper/lower bands at 2 standard deviations

buy_conditions.description: RSI oversold recovery with Bollinger Band support

sell_conditions.description: RSI overbought with Bollinger Band resistance
